member.name: WS_XML_READER_PROPERTIES
member.summary: A structure that is used to specify a set of s.

member.name: WS_XML_READER_PROPERTIES.properties
member.summary: An array of properties. The number of elements in the array is specified using the propertyCount parameter. This field may be NULL if the propertyCount is 0.

member.name: WS_XML_READER_PROPERTIES.propertyCount
member.summary: The number of elements in the properties array.
